word: A Broad Education Including Bible Work.--The Lord designs that the school should also be a place where a training may be gained in women's work-- cooking, housework, dressmaking, bookkeeping, correct reading, and pronunciation. They are to be qualified to take any post that may be offered-- superintendents, Sabbath school teachers, Bible workers. They must be prepared to teach day schools for children.--Letter 3, 1898.
